bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Telecommunications and information exchange between systems
Local and metropolitan area networks-- Part 11: Wireless LAN Medium Access Control (MAC) and Physical Layer (PHY) Specifications
Amendment 4: Enhancements For Transit Links Within Bridged Networks

IEEE Draft Standard for Telecommunications and information exchange between systems - Local and metropolitan area networks-- Part 11: Wireless LAN Medium Access Control (MAC) and Physical Layer (PHY) Specifications - Amendment 4: Enhancements For Transit Links Within Bridged Networks

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Protocols, procedures, and managed objects to enhance the ability of IEEE 802.11(TM) media to provide transit links internal to IEEE 802.1Q(TM) bridged networks are specified in this amendment to IEEE Std 802.11(TM)-2016.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibitem.formattedref: IEEE Std 802.11-2012 (Revision of IEEE Std 802.11-2007) - Redline
